content: As of 21 October 2025, the [Singapore Armed Forces](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces) (SAF) has one [three-star admiral](/wiki/Three-star_rank), four [two-star generals / admirals](/wiki/Two-star_rank) and 32 [one-star generals, one-star admirals](/wiki/One-star_rank) or [equivalent](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces_ranks#Military_experts). ## Chiefs of Armed Services Officers in these positions are expected to promote to [brigadier-general](/wiki/Brigadier_general), [rear admiral](/wiki/Rear_admiral) or [Military Expert 8](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces_ranks#Military_experts).
